name: RhythmBattle
description:
It is a rhythm type game where you would have to hit the arrow keys on time in order to damage the enemy that you will be facing. When you miss any of the arrow keys the enemy will take damage.

https://crisncris0000.itch.io/ my itch

https://itch.io/profile/phillipb9345 Philip who helped with the game!

Music: https://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty-free-tracks/cutting-the-sky

Art kit:  https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
